description: This simple smoked haddock risotto makes a warming and comforting dinner.
name: Smoked Haddock, Leek & Pea Risotto Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 medium lemons, juice of 2, plus 2 tsp zest

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the butter in a large pan on medium heat and cook the leeks for 5 minutes, stirring all the time. Stir in the garlic and cook for 1 minute.
Stir in the rice and cook for 2 minutes, add the lemon zest and add the stock in stages, stirring until it is absorbed before adding the next ladleful, this will take 25-30 minutes.
Place the haddock in a saucepan, cover with water, bring to the boil then reduce the heat to a simmer and cook for 3-4 minutes. Remove from the pan and flake.
Stir in the peas, flaked haddock, parmesan and lemon juice, cover and set aside for 2 minutes then serve.
